entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression: SyntaxFactory.UsingDirective overload always throws #68761
  • Error format doc comment "Ctrl+K, Ctrl+D" formats incorrect comment when the comment in the same line of bracket `{, },(`, #68760
  • Compiler can silently generate a bad image when there's 0xFFFF parameters in the module #68754

Closed

  • [BUG] References Code Lens always enabled #68591
    17.7 P4
  • Extract method doesn't highlight newly named method fully #68592
    17.7 P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Test and fix for passing default through #68762
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Simplify and make consistent query-context tracking in the parser #68757
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix ambiguity parsing collection expressions vs conditional access expressions #68756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • remove long gone owners #68755
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Fixed CA1854: Prefer IDictionary.TryGetValue(TKey, out TValue) occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Collection literals: remove DictionaryElementSyntax #68752
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
